\subsection{Streptococcaceae}

\begin{small}
Streptococcaceae is a family of bacteria commonly found in the mouth and gut
that have a variety of beneficial roles. Some species of Streptococcaceae are
involved in the production of essential vitamins such as folate and vitamin K,
while others are involved in the breakdown of complex carbohydrates and the
production of SCFAs.
\end{small}
